error.message: Call to deprecated function db_change_field(). Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Instead, get a database connection injected into your service from the container, get its schema driver, and call changeField() on it. For example,
Call to deprecated function node_type_get_types(). Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use Drupal\node\Entity\NodeType::loadMultiple().
Call to deprecated function node_type_get_types(). Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use Drupal\node\Entity\NodeType::loadMultiple().
Call to deprecated function node_type_get_types(). Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use Drupal\node\Entity\NodeType::loadMultiple().

Call to deprecated function drupal_render_children(). Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Avoid early rendering when possible or loop through the elements and render them as they are available.

Call to deprecated function db_change_field(). Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Instead, get a database connection injected into your service from the container, get its schema driver, and call changeField() on it. For example,

Call to deprecated constant DRUPAL_ANONYMOUS_RID: Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use Drupal\Core\Session\AccountInterface::ANONYMOUS_ROLE or \Drupal\user\RoleInterface::ANONYMOUS_ID instead.

Call to deprecated constant DRUPAL_AUTHENTICATED_RID: Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use Drupal\Core\Session\AccountInterface::AUTHENTICATED_ROLE or \Drupal\user\RoleInterface::AUTHENTICATED_ID instead.

Call to deprecated constant DRUPAL_ANONYMOUS_RID: Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use Drupal\Core\Session\AccountInterface::ANONYMOUS_ROLE or \Drupal\user\RoleInterface::ANONYMOUS_ID instead.

Call to deprecated constant DRUPAL_AUTHENTICATED_RID: Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use Drupal\Core\Session\AccountInterface::AUTHENTICATED_ROLE or \Drupal\user\RoleInterface::AUTHENTICATED_ID instead.
Call to deprecated function node_type_get_types(). Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use Drupal\node\Entity\NodeType::loadMultiple().

Call to deprecated constant DRUPAL_ANONYMOUS_RID: Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use Drupal\Core\Session\AccountInterface::ANONYMOUS_ROLE or \Drupal\user\RoleInterface::ANONYMOUS_ID instead.

Call to deprecated constant DRUPAL_AUTHENTICATED_RID: Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use Drupal\Core\Session\AccountInterface::AUTHENTICATED_ROLE or \Drupal\user\RoleInterface::AUTHENTICATED_ID instead.
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to node_limit.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://drupal.org/node/3070687.
